name: Engineering Study Group
description: Weekly study sessions for engineering students. We cover calculus, physics, and programming.

name: Business Students Network
description: Connect with fellow business students, share internship opportunities, and discuss case studies.

name: Language Exchange Partners
description: Practice English and learn other languages with native speakers. Great for improving communication skills.

name: International Cooking Club
description: Learn to cook dishes from different countries and share your cultural cuisine with others.

name: Fitness Buddies
description: Stay active and healthy with group workouts, hiking trips, and sports activities.

name: Photography Enthusiasts
description: Explore Brisbane through photography. We organize photo walks and share techniques.
